subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Sebastian Janikowski and the Oakland Raiders agreed on a four-year, $16 million deal that is the richest contract for a place-kicker in N.F.L. history, the team said.
snippet: Sebastian Janikowski and the Oakland Raiders agreed on a four-year, $16 million deal that is the richest contract for a place-kicker in N.F.L. history, the team said.
